docs: the corridiors were shabby , and our room had dust behind the beds ( as i was looking for a power outlet ) , cobwebs ...the room while rustic , was clean .housekeepers still going flat out at 4.30pm .bed terribly made with ill - fitting linen .broken grouting on the bathroom tiles . </DOC> the room was clean .listen to neighbours ' noise and check bugs and other pets .i have stayed ... ever .everything looks quite dusty and the hallways are particularly dirty .we had a nice , clean room with no air conditioning , but a table fan , ceiling fan and window fan made sleeping very comfortable . </DOC> they are not properly lit at night .we were tired and the last thing we wanted to do was push our luggage up a hill ( even on a cart ) after a very long day .the room itself was just " ok .the rooms were clean and plain , as expected from reading in the guidebook .the room was clean , the beds very comfortable , the bathroom was standard .
